channel.title: Sqlite on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Sqlite on My New Hugo Site

item.title: sqlite insert replace
item.description: Sqlite insert && replace Assuming 3 columns in the table.. ID, NAME, ROLE BAD: This will insert or replace all columns with new values for ID=1: INSERT OR REPLACE INTO Employee (id, name, role) VALUES (1, 'John Foo', 'CEO'); BAD: This will insert or replace 2 of the columns… the NAME column will be set to NULL or the default value: INSERT OR REPLACE INTO Employee (id, role) VALUES (1, 'code monkey'); GOOD: This will update 2 of the columns.
